DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>routes`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>routes` ( `routeId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `regex` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `code` decimal(3,0) NOT NULL, `source` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `target` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`routeId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `regex` (`regex`), KEY `code` (`code`), KEY `source` (`source`), KEY `target` (`target`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
